name: claude-workflow
description: A comprehensive workflow system for Claude Code with specialized agents, skills, commands, and hooks for software development.

features.name: Specialized Agents
features.description: 7 expert agents for orchestration, code review, debugging, documentation, security, refactoring, and test design.

features.name: Workflow Commands
features.description: 17 commands for different coding modes, git workflows, and verification tasks.

features.name: Knowledge Skills
features.description: 6 skill modules covering project analysis, testing, architecture, APIs, git, and performance.

features.name: Automation Hooks
features.description: Pre and post tool hooks for security, formatting, logging, and notifications.

installation.instructions: Copy the profiles/safe/claude directory to your project or link globally.
